text: India achieved 100% electrification of villages under the Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Gram Jyoti Yojana by April 2018.
fact_text: India achieved 100% electrification of villages under the Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Gram Jyoti Yojana by April 2018.

text: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana has opened over 46 crore bank accounts as of 2023, making it the world's largest financial inclusion program.
fact_text: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana has opened over 46 crore bank accounts as of 2023, making it the world's largest financial inclusion program.

text: Ayushman Bharat scheme has provided free healthcare to over 5 crore families covering 50 crore beneficiaries.
fact_text: Ayushman Bharat scheme has provided free healthcare to over 5 crore families covering 50 crore beneficiaries.

text: Digital India initiative has connected over 6 lakh villages with optical fiber under BharatNet project.

fact_text: Digital India initiative has connected over 6 lakh villages with optical fiber under BharatNet project.

text: Swachh Bharat Mission constructed over 11 crore toilets and achieved Open Defecation Free status for entire country by October 2019.

text: PM-KISAN scheme provides Rs 6,000 annual income support to 12 crore farmer families across India.
